name: The Doomsday Glock
description:
You seem stuck in a loop. Raise your T.E.M.P.O and make up for lost time.

CONTROLS:

  • Left mouse button: Shoot
  • Right mouse button: Charged shot
  • Space key: Dash
  • W A S D keys: Move the character
  • Q key: Makes time slow
  • ESC key: Pause the game

Soundtrack:

  1.  8 Bit Nostalgia - FesliyanStudios
  2.  Slowest Tempo-Retro Platforming - FesliyanStudios

Made by:

  • Marcos Alves
  • Marcos Dias
  • Jennifer Costa
  • Pierre Sousa
  • Victor Jardim
